result.title: Enabling Platform for Water Symbiotic Schemes
result.description: An online platform, which will be able to (a) map the water/wastewater streams in a given geographical region, (b) propose alternative solutions for wastewater reuse, and (c) assess the economic feasibility of the proposed solutions, based on the economic output of each involved stakeholder (source and receiver of the wastewater).[This Deliverable is related to Task 2.9]

result.title: Production System & Value Chain Dynamic Process Modell
result.description: The novel process modelling scheme to be used by WaterCPS will be detailed. The scheme will encompass production line(s) and value chain(s).and be implemented in software. The dynamic elements & algorithms that will connect to RTM to provide shadow twining of the physical systems will also be detailed. Basic models for the 6 use case will be described.[This Deliverable is related to Task 4.1]

result.title: Cognitive Model and Simulation of Water-Related Processes
result.description: Extensions to the D4.1 base process modelling scheme will be detailed and add cognitive attributes to the models. An extensive system scenario building and simulation mechanism will be described, as well as related algorithms that will provide services to the Knowledge Core and any water efficiency tools, like those developed by T1.4 - T1.6.[This Deliverable is related to Task 4.3]

result.title: a. Water Efficiency Optimization Services (Intermediate Report)
result.description: Intermediate report on the mathematical models for all optimization problems encountered in AquaSPICE, generic and scalable optimization methods, possibly relying upon optimization platforms (e.g., Gurobi, CPLEX).
